title: CounterCog
author: Kuro
description: Have you ever wondered, how many commands/cogs does your bot have? Well this cog can help with that!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `CounterCog`!
If you think the number isn't accurate, remember that this also counts subcommands.
To get started, do `[p]count cogs` or `[p]count commands [Cog]`.
This cog has docs! Check it out at <https://kuro-cogs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cogs/countercog.html>.
short: A cog that shows how many commands/cogs the bot has.
